${ModID}:PowerupPunch.NAME: Powerup Punch
${ModID}:PowerupPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:RisingEdge.NAME: Rising Edge
${ModID}:RisingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL kunoichi:Opener: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
${ModID}:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card to deal !D! damage and apply !M! kunoichi:Bleeding. Applies additional kunoichi:Bleeding equal to the card's cost.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need another card to fire.
